recommended_degree: Pemasaran Digital, Manajemen Pemasaran, Manajemen Pemasaran/Marketing, Statistika Bisnis (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Assist in managing partnership communication and integration
2. Support ongoing communication with multiple partners, including responding to inquiries and relaying messages to ensure alignment among all stakeholders.
3. Gain understanding of partnership processes and data
4. Learn how partnership workflows operate, analyze their execution, and interpret results presented in data form.
5. Monitor daily partnership performance
6. Review and analyze performance reports to identify insights that can contribute to product improvements.
7. Provide insights and prepare structured reports
8. Develop comprehensive reports on partnership performance and ongoing assessments, using data-driven analysis as a key deliverable of the internship.
